item.description:
A first look at "Moana 2" is here.

On Wednesday, Walt Disney Company CEO Bob Iger announced the release date for the upcoming sequel with a new video teaser. Watch it here: trib.al/zcSAKye

Disney is the parent company of ABC News and "Good Morning America."
